# Wikipedia with Zhuyin

## Main Features

This is an educational browser extension that allows you to toggle Zhuyin mode by clicking the extension icon.

In Zhuyin mode, Wikipedia's font will be enlarged, and Zhuyin annotations will be added to make it easier for young children to use.

## Installation Steps

1. **Download "BpmfGenYoGothic Font"**
   [Download Link](https://github.com/ButTaiwan/bpmfvs/releases/download/v1.320/BpmfGenYoGothic.zip)

2. Extract the downloaded file and open the folder

3. Click "BpmfGenYoGothic-R.ttf" to install the "BpmfGenYoGothic Font"

4. After installing the font, proceed to install this extension

### Chrome Web Store Link:

[Wikipedia with Zhuyin](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/%E7%B6%AD%E5%9F%BA%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%8A%A0%E6%B3%A8%E9%9F%B3/bklcpdppephbnjdfpofichhacblhbknf?hl=zh-TW)

## Usage

Once installed, click the extension icon in the top-right corner of the browser to toggle Zhuyin mode.

## Bug Report

If you encounter any issues, please report them via [Issues](https://github.com/bestian/zhuin/issues).
long.zh_TW:
# 維基百科加注音

## 主要功能

這是一個教育性的擴充功能，可以讓您點擊擴充功能的小圖示以切換成注音模式。

注音模式會讓維基百科的字體變大，並且加上注音，方便小朋友使用。

## 安裝步驟

1. **下載「源樣注音明體」**
   [下載連結](https://github.com/ButTaiwan/bpmfvs/releases/download/v1.320/BpmfGenYoGothic.zip)

2. 將壓縮檔解壓縮，進入解壓後的資料夾

3. 點擊 "BpmfGenYoGothic-R.ttf" 以安裝「源樣注音明體」

4. 安裝完字體後，接著安裝此擴充功能

### Chrome 擴充功能商店連結：

[維基百科加注音](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/%E7%B6%AD%E5%9F%BA%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%8A%A0%E6%B3%A8%E9%9F%B3/bklcpdppephbnjdfpofichhacblhbknf?hl=zh-TW)

## 使用方法

安裝完成後，點擊瀏覽器右上角的擴充功能圖示，即可切換注音模式。

## 錯誤回報

如有任何問題，請至 [Issues](https://github.com/bestian/zhuin/issues) 提出回報。
